abstract: Joan Raymond Frequent Flier column features experiences of Jesse Itzler, co-founder of Marquis Jet, which sells access to NetJets planes.
snippet: Jesse Itzler, co-founder of Marquis Jet, which sells access to NetJets planes, is not crazy about flying, but he once flew to snowy Utah to raise some business.
lead_paragraph: Jesse Itzler, co-founder of Marquis Jet, which sells access to NetJets planes, is not crazy about flying, but he once flew to snowy Utah to raise some business.

headline.main: No Car, No Hotel, No Luggage. But He Got the Account.
headline.print_headline: No Car, No Hotel, No Luggage. But He Got the Account.
headline.seo: Selling Private Jet Service With Chattering Teeth
